sentences.sContent: Is it possible to declare variables in VHDL with an asterisk?
sentences.sContent_eng: Is it possible to declare variables in VHDL with an asterisk?
sentences.sCn: 有可能在硬件描述语言（VHDL）声明变量与一个星号?。

sentences.sContent: A tiny asterisk conducted me to a footnote at the bottom of the page.
sentences.sContent_eng: A tiny asterisk conducted me to a footnote at the bottom of the page.
sentences.sCn: 一个小小的星形符号把我的目光引到了那页底部一个说明上。

trans.tranOther: a mark like a star (*), used especially to show something interesting or important
